Game Launchers.name: Steam
Game Launchers.description: You all know what Steam is.

Game Launchers.name: Heroic Games Launcher
Game Launchers.description: Epic Games Launcher and GOG launcher. Epic Games Launcher isn't supported. But this is better than even on Windows!

Game Launchers.name: Itch
Game Launchers.description: Indie game, assets, jam finding and serving application. Take a look at indie developers games and publish your own.

Game Launchers.name: Lutris
Game Launchers.description: Serves community installer scripts to automatically configure the Wine environment for required games.

Game Launchers.name: Bottles
Game Launchers.description: Bottles' Gaming Environment comes preconfigured to support a large set of Windows video games on Linux.

Communication.name: Discord
Communication.description: You all know what Discord is. In this program select to use XOrg over Wayland to be able to stream screen. Unfortunately Discord doesn't support audio streaming and overlay yet.

Communication.name: Discover Overlay
Communication.description: Third party support for Discord overlay to be able to see who is speaking right now. Highly customizable.

Communication.name: Team Speak
Communication.description: You all know what Team Speak is.

Communication.name: Easy Effects
Communication.description: Audio effects for pipewire applications. Make the voice your microphone capture more understandable and better quality.

Tools.name: LogMeIn Hamachi (No GUI)
Tools.description: A zero-configuration VPN service. Run this command after install: <font color="green" face="monospace">pkexec systemctl enable --now logmein-hamachi.service</font>

Tools.name: HaGUIchi (GUI for Hamachi)
Tools.description: Provides a user friendly GUI to control the Hamachi client on Linux

Tools.name: QJoyPad
Tools.description: Simply JoyToKey for Linux. Convert gamepad actions to keyboard or mouse actions.

Tools.name: JS Test
Tools.description: Joystick, gamepad shortly game controller testing interface for Linux.

Tools.name: Feral GameMode
Tools.description: Support for optimisations including CPU governor, I/O priority, process niceness, kernel scheduler (SCHED_ISO).

Tools.name: Goverlay
Tools.description: Graphical tweaker for Mangohud and vkBasalt. Highly recommended to use.

Tools.name: Mangohud
Tools.description: Simply Riva Tuner Statistics Server for Linux. Shows FPS, CPU and GPU's usage and heat, RAM and Swap usage etc. To use add <font color="orange" face="monospace">mangohud</font> on terminal or write <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud %command%</font> on Steam launch options.

Tools.name: vkBasalt
Tools.description: Vulkan post processing layer to enhance the visual graphics of games. To use add <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud ENABLE_VKBASALT=1</font> on terminal or write <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud ENABLE_VKBASALT=1 %command%</font> on Steam launch options.

Runtimes.name: Proton GE Custom
Runtimes.description: Custom Proton (Wine version by Steam to run games.) by Glorious Eggroll that includes many additional components. Performs better than default Proton. Updates automatically. Does not require protonup-qt.

Runtimes.name: Wine (Wine Is Not an Emulator)
Runtimes.description: Compatibility layer capable of running Windows applications on several POSIX-compliant operating systems.

Runtimes.name: Wine Mono
Runtimes.description: Open source version of .Net Framework. Required for Windows applications using .Net Framework.

Runtimes.name: Wine Gecko
Runtimes.description: Wine's built-in replacement for Microsoft's Internet Explorer. May be required in some cases.

Runtimes.name: Wine Tricks
Runtimes.description: Graphical interface for script to install various redistributable runtime libraries in Wine.

Runtimes.name: OpenJDK JRE (latest)
Runtimes.description: OpenJDK latest Java full runtime environment.
